raw_comment: I wonder why in some states, there are different months that first leafs where seen. For example, in California, there are first leaf sightings in different months. However in Kansas, there are only first leaf sightings in March.
ace_sentences: I wonder why some states have different months in which people see first leaves.
In California, people see first leaves in different months.
In Kansas, people see first leaves only in March.
